subject: Re: Website is live!
preview: Removed the Customer Reviews section above the Featured Furniture & Appliances  and saved it as a template for backup FYI

full_threads.body: Removed the Customer Reviews section above the Featured Furniture & Appliances  and saved it as a template for backup FYI

Hi David, 

Hope all is well. Confirming we have temporarily removed the "Customer Reviews" on the Homepage of the site and they are ready for you to review. 

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
﻿ It was a few months ago now.

I just noticed the customer reviews is the Latin template. Can you hide the reviews for now until we populate properly?



Regards

David
0418 243 448

>>>>>>>> On Thu, Mar 11, 2021 at 8:18 PM David McLean <Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au> wrote:
>>>>>>>> Hi Alban,
>>>>>>>> Some weeks ago, I mentioned that we would add smart TV’s to the Renta Centre website.
>>>>>>>> David has now added them and Maddy is about to send out an EDM advertising it to previous customers.
>>>>>>>> Can you help us with two things
>>>>>>>> 1/ the SEO keywords we should include in the text on the website and: We are already targeting TV rentals as part of the SEO work and the site is ranking well for it. The few tweaks below would be good to implement to better align the content against smart tvs
>>>>>>> On the page https://rentacentre.com.au/product/extra-large-55-4k-uhd-smart-tv/
>>>>>>> Update page title to: Rent a Smart TV in Sydney - Renta Centre
>>>>>>> Update meta description to: Hire an extra large smart tv at flexible terms from 1 to 6 months with Renta Centre, Sydney's leading TV rental company. Enquire online now!
>>>>>>> On the page https://rentacentre.com.au/rent/electronics/tvs/TV Rental - Hire LCD, LED & Plasma TVs in Sydney - Renta CentreUpdate page title to: Rent a Smart TV in Sydney - Renta Centre
>>>>>>> Update page title to TV Rental - Hire LCD, LED & Smart TVs in Sydney - Renta Centre
>>>>>>> Update meta description to: Rent LCD, LED Plasma and SmartTVs at flexible terms from 1 to 6 months with Renta Centre, Sydney's leading rental company. Enquire online now!
>>>>>>> In the category text down the page, it would be good to ensure the term "Smart TV" is used more frequently
>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>> 2/ a new adwords campaign to support this. This will be part of the existing Renta spend budget Ok we will create.
>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>> Separately, can you let me know if we have any Renta adwords campaigns paused. Exercise bikes are paused
>>>>>>>> Thanks
>>>>>>>>
>>>>>>>> Kind Regards,
>>>>>>>>
